column4: How do I stop this PC from rebooting after starting a Ubuntu 6.10 install?
any special kernel messages before it reboots?
I wish. It gets to loading the kernel sometimes, toher times, to loading the initd. Reboot seems almost random.
This is the box, its got Gentoo on it right now.
is this a dell box nvidia mcp55 chipset"
I wish. :( Its an IBM Aptiva, old.
Let me find the model number.
Hmm? See if Knoppix runs on it? Or try to install via Knoppix?
